## NOTIFICATION\_MESSAGE\_OPTIONS variable

Token for injecting options for notification message component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE_OPTIONS: InjectionToken<NotificationMessageOptions<any>>
```
